description.narrative: 1.7 Households in eight districts (Port Loko, Bombali, Tonkolili, Moyamba, Pujehun, Kenema, Bonthe and Koinadugu) have access to sustainable safe water by 2014, which contributes to Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2014, under-fives, children, adolescents and women of child bearing age utilize essential high impact child survival and development services (prevention, treatment and care)
